text: 0,5 l bottle. Unclear orange brown in the glass, two finger frothy head. Taste has banana and citrus, little bit sulfur. Wheat and yeast in the background. High carbonated. Nice but it could be getting a little bit more power in the second part.

0,5 l bottle. Pours hazy brown amber with small off white head. Aroma of bananas, caramel, yeast, bread, a hint of chocolate. Taste is medium sweet with hardly noticeable bitterness. Body is light and refreshing, texture is slick and carbonation quite lively. As it warms up caramel comes up front. 
There is absolutely nothing wrong with this beer, its pleasant and drinkable, but it does leave a feeling that it could be better if it was just a bit richer.

Brown coloured ale with a off white head.

Aroma: figs, slightly metallic, yeast, wheat.

Taste: figs, yeasty, wheat, some hints of chocolate and some banana.

Boca 0,5L - iz Magic beer rooma...nema onaj metalni okus kao kod Paulanerovoga dunkela i to mu je zamjerka...ostalo sasvim solidno, ima banane, malo se i čokolade osjeti i najvanije, stvarno je pitko pivo..

Hazy golden color with medium and quickly disapperaing white head.
Aroma: bread, banana, caramel, wheat
Taste: medium sweet

Hazy dark amber/brown body with a big tan head. Cloves, banana, raisins, bread, yeast, resin, wheat, a bit herbal, nuts. Medium sweet, with light bitterness, a little tart as well. Creamy, light to medium body, lively carbonation. 
Quite quaffable and not too full. Decent, widely available Dunkelweizen.
Murky brown, nice tan head. A lot of dried bananas, light caramel, fenolic spice and yeast. Body is a bit watery, but still very enjoyable.

Nagy, nagyon tartós hab, barna szín. Enyhén karamelles, banános, fűszeres illat. Kissé vizes, enyhén karamelles, búzás ízek. Könnyű, erősen szénsavas, szinte egyáltalán nem keserű. Kellemes, könnyed sör.

Aroma is caramel, malt and touch of banana. Pours opaque dark brown with rather large frothy head. In flavor much more malty than the not-dark variety, with some caramel and the yeastiness shifting to the background. Light body, medium carbonation. Nice but not as stunning as their regular hefeweizen.

Cervesa fluixa. M agraden les cerveses Dunkel amb més caràcter . Li falta aroma, una bona olor, un recorregut a la boca més llarg, una evolució a copa més llarga. Una cervesa prescindible, pensada massa pel gran public.

Color marrón rojizo con la cabeza blanca. Se asienta como capa delgada pero cremosa de espuma. Cordón moderado. El aroma es dulce. Limonada con toques de plátano. Un poco tostado. Cacao ligero. Carbonatación muy fuerte y paladar ligeramente grueso. El sabor es bastante dulce pero ligero. Muy ligera amargura. El regusto es dulce con notas agrias. Caballo de batalla a precio asequible en supermercados.
Brotig fruchtiger Geruch. Im Antrunk leichte Säure, vollmundiger Geschmack mit guter Würze. Der Kohlensäuregehalt passt sehr gut.
Backlog. 50cl bottle from systembolaget. Pours dark brown with big head. Malty, mild smokey with some sweet caramel.
Bottle at Teddys Softbar, september 22nd 2016. Dark brown body with an offwhite head. Aroma of caramel, earth, banana. Taste is sweet and grainy with sopay yeast esters, quite mild taste all in all.

500ml. bottle in Mae Kasa, Thailand. Pours a cloudy red/brown with a reddish white head that dissipates quickly. Aroma of roasted malt, dark fruits. Tastes very roasty, malty, biscuity. Medium carbonation that settles. A pleasant but prickly mouthfeel. A good, solid, well-balanced Dunkel.
Tastes of banana, clove, light coffee and pear. Light-medium body, low carbonation and a finish of roasted banana.
Flaska. Dimmig brun öl med ett större ljusbeige weissbierskum. Doft av lätt rostad malt, lätta skumbanantoner och jäst. I smaken tillkommer lättare toner av torkad frukt.

500 ml bottle. Cloudy brown to orange colour, small head quickly shrinking, low lacing, lively carbonation. Nose is malt and yeast, aroma is medium sweet, banana, relatively watery with an unpleasant metallic note. Short finish. Less than average.
Bottle from duty free, Viking Line. Smoky taste, very strange appearance. Not convinced by this one.
50cl bottle. Belle robe cuivrée, notes de céréales et de caramel. Assez malté.

Aroma: Roasty, toast nuts and caramel notes.
Appearance: Dark brown with cloudy liquid and medium white head.
Taste: Light bitter notes with a medium sweet touch.
Palate: Medium body with creamy texture and soft carbonation. Medium bitter/sweet finish.
Overall: This was my definition for toast beer but I have tried other and this was different (of course, because is a wheat beer).
Fles gedeeld met Benzai en TomHendriksen en Roelzie. Weinig aroma en smaak. Smaak ebt snel weg.

Bottle @ tasting at TomHendriksen. Thanks for sharing Inoven. Clear reddish color, average sized off-white head. Smell and taste wheat, some sweetness, slightly banana and a hint of caramel. Average body and carbonation. Ok beer.
Fles gedeeld door Inoven, geprobeerd met Benzai en Roelzie1986. Het is een donkerroodbruin bier met weinig schuim. Het heeft een zacht zoete smaak.
A german, brown Dunkel Weissbier with white head. Aroma is banana, caramel, yeast. Taste sweet and light bitter.

Poured from the 0,5 liter bottle in home. Aroma is malt caramel , a bit toasted bread and nuts. A litlle bit of banana. Appearance is red-brown color, cloudy liquid, good white head. Taste is medium sweet, light bitter, light sour.Palate is light body, lightly creamy texture ,lively carbonation, abrupt finish. If you like not filtered wheat beer, is your choice, but if I needed to choose, I prefer Franziscaner Naturtrub to this..

Bastante difrutable en líneas generales. En su liga es de lo que más me agrada; visualmente marrón, turbia, corona lograda, buen encaje, burbuja pequeña y compacta. Aroma predominan el pan tostado y las levaduras características, en boca apreciamos un dulzor tostado con matices a platano y el punto ácido que no pasa desapercibido. Se puede encontrar poca cosa mejor a mejor precio. 

¡Salud!
Some sharp roast like a marshmallow stick. Liggt nut and a little caramel. Dark brown pour with decent head. Clean finish. Tap at beer garden.

Bottle 50 cl. Pours a reddish to purplish brown with a small to medium creamy white head and an aroma of banana, vanilla, roasty malts, yeast, earth and white chocolate. The tast is slight to medium sweet with a velvetty mouthfeel and a slightly hoppy finish. Very nice.

From 50cl bottle. Pours dark brown with beautiful reflections and cream foam, abundant. Aroma is sweet of caramel, very malty, nuts. Body is light. Taste is sweet, though not too much. Bitterness not perceived. Finish is short, shorter than expected.
Pours brown, cloudy, frothy foam. Aromatic. dry fruits, wheat, yeast, plums. Lightly bitter, medium sweetness. Soft carbonation, Yeasty aftertaste.

Bouteille de 50cl. Couleur chataîgne, belle mousse crêmeuse de tenue moyenne. Des arômes de bananes légèrement caramélisés, un soupçon d épice. Longueur et carbonnation de belle tenue. Rafraîchissante et gourmande à la fois. Trouvée à Vn B - Noyelle Godault.

UPDATED: FEB 23, 2017 Birra dal colore ambrato torbido. La schiuma è di un color nocciola chiaro, finissima e persistente. All?olfatto si percepisce sentore farinoso, dovuto all?abbondanza dei lieviti, con un tono di fruttato. Al palato si sente la il fruttato, banana, pesca con una lieve acidità con un finale lievemente tostato. Buona birra.

Sweet malt smell no clove or banana.
Brownish hazy body
Sweet toasted toasty taste
Medium light body medium high carbonation.

Ok
Hazy light brown liquid, average head. Strong aroma of banana and yeast. Light body, average carbonation. Taste is sweet, iron.

zapach bardzo przyjemny, słodki, goździkowy, bananowy, karmelowy z nutami wanilii i biszkoptów i lekkiej kawy zbożowej. kolor rdzawobrązowy, silnie opalizujący, piana drobna, jasnobeżowa, obfita, dość trwała. w smaku pełne,słodowe, lekko kwaskowe, z nutami banana, wanilii, karmelu, ciemnego pieczywa. goryczka niewielka, karmelowa i ziołowa. nasycenie bardzo wysokie

Aroma - banana with dried and a bit fermented fruits, white wheat flour, dough and fresh white bread, a bit of grain sourness, yeasts.
Taste - malt, wheat, banana, fresh and a bit fermented fruits, wheat dough, a bit of sourness and sweetness, yeasts. Good and well balanced!
UPDATED: FEB 15, 2017 Buena cerveza de trigo dunkel. Aroma suave y agradable. Apariencia marrón con tonos rojizos con cobertura de espuma color marfil. Sabor medio cuerpo y paladar correcto.
user_location: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, SPAIN

text: caramel, bread, banana, brown, hazy, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body, soft carbonation,

500 ml bottle. Pours hazy dark ruby, off-white head. Aroma of banana, clove, caramel, dark bread, biscuit. Taste is full of esters in the kind of banana and clove, as well as wheat malt and bread flavors. High body, smooth texture, medium to high carbonation.
Bottle from Rewe - Dark mahagoni color, small head. Taste is roasted malts, some banana, slightly bitter finish. Body is medium. Its okay but poor compared to other Dunkelweizen. Mass-market quality.
Den gode klassike smag af hvedeøl fra Tyskland. Ikke min favorit men helt klar en god øl.
Resistant foam, in the taste notes of bread, caramel sweetness and something fruity.

Copenhagen 8/1 2017. 50cl bottle from Netto. Happy monk gobbling beer on the label. Looking intensely satisfied. Pours cloudy reddish brown with white head. Settles as thin but creamy layer of foam. Moderate lacing. Aroma is sweetish. Lemonade with hints of banana. A little roasted. Light cocoa. Tart notes. Quite strong carbonation and slightly thick palate. Flavor is quite sweet but light. Almost a parody of a wheat beer but with a nice roasted edge. Very light bitterness. Aftertaste is sweet with tart notes. Exactly what I expected - but that can be quite nice when you expect a fine but not very original Dunkelweizen.

Bottle. Beautiful brown turning into red. Thick foamy head with lots of lacing. Aroma is malty, fruity and bananas with just a little bit of yeast and clove. Taste follows aroma. Yeast and clove have a lesser impact than they have in Franziskaners Weissbier. Pleasingly not sweet. Nice mouthfeel and easily sessionable. A really good Dunkelweizen.
Colore rosso scuro, marrone, schiuma abbondante. odore di vaniglia, caramello, banana, cereali. Sapore vaniglia, caramello, banana, cereali, leggero tostato. Un classico sempre buono.
Braunes trübes bier, schöner cremiger schaum, Geruch Banane leicht malzig im Geschmack viel reife Banane Malz etwas hopfen leicht herb
Nutty brown appearance with little creamy head. Tastes of banana, clove, light coffee and pear. Light-medium body, low carbonation and a finish of roasted banana. A little boring
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.

Bottle from Alcostock in Tallinn,  1.79. BB 21.06.2017. Pours brownish-mahogany, the creamy head fizzes away rather fast. Aroma of sweetish toasty-marmalady-yeasty notes, oven-baked banana too. Tastes malty sweet, dark fruits, baked banana, slight spicy notes in the finish. Carbonation fine, body lightish medium. Pretty nice.
Bottle from Netto. Pours hazy dark brown with an off-white head. Aroma and taste is malt, caramel notes, dark fruits, yeast, some spices. Light body. Soft carbonation. Slightly bitter finish.

Bottle, 50cl. Pours dark amber colour with small, off-white head. Banana, caramel malts, clove, spices, wheat and yeast in the nose. Some earthy, toasty notes as well. More malty in flavour than the original hefe, still very fruity with ripe bananas, cloves and yeast. Nice caramel tastiness with sweet flavour, that balances beautiful with the yeast and spices. Middletones of dark ripe berries, bread, plums perhaps, more spices, citrus peel, hay and grass. Medium body. Very light bitterness towards the yeasty, caramel finish. Doesnt blow your mind, but still really rather good.
Dark amber with off white head - Malt aroma - Malt body with hints of caramel - The malt goes into the finish - This was nice
Bottle. Pours hazy brown with foamy tan head. Aroma has banana, malt, wheat and yeast. Taste has also banana, yeast and wheat, but also some hints of chocolate. Not bad, but not too special either.

0.5l bottle. Malty aroma, banana and caramel notes. Hazy dark amber color, white head. Malty taste, caramel and banana notes, soft bitter and sweet, medium sour. Medium body, watery texture, soft to average carbonation and soft sour finish. Very good, refreshing.

Pours dark ruby colour with medium size off white head, hazy liquid. Aroma of grass, hay, malt. Medium sweet, lightly bitter, very low sourness. Light body, thin feel, average carbonization, abrupt very soft sour after taste with some coffee notes.

Weissbier brune typique, trouble et avec une mousse fine. Nez rond, très pâtissier, sur le caramel, le chocolat, le miel, la châtaigne, le malt, le pain noir, les céréales cuites, le sarrasin... Aucune trace dalcool ni dagrumes. En bouche, la carbonatation est faible et lalcool commence à être perceptible. La texture est légèrement huileuse, aucune sécheresse. Une petite amertume cependant sur la gorgée avec un côté minéral et métallique, vite masquée par les arômes déposés sur la langue et le palet. Petit goût de levures agréable qui accompagne bien le final de longueur moyenne. Assez peu de sucres, ce qui en fait une boisson assez désaltérante tout en étant assez dense. Une très bonne Weissbier brune comme Franziskaner sait si bien les faire. Bouteille 50cl, V&B Grenoble.

500 ml bottle. Pours a hazy grey-brown with an off-white head. The aroma is slightly yeasty with some lightly roasted malty notes (maple syrup) and spices. Light to medium watery body with average carbonation. Very light bitterness. The taste is rather flat, cardboard some malt, nutty. Rather boring.
Kedvencem a dunkelweiss, ezzel mellé nem trafálsz. Igyál-egyél eleget, salátát is, ne csak meleget.
Nice coffee colour with fine head. Sweet aroma. Hint of cloves and caramel.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

Bottle. Dark brown body with large lasting tan head. Aroma is slightly roasted malts hints of dried fruits and some yeast. Taste is nice malty with some caramel and yeast. Aftertaste is yeasty and malty.

UPDATED: OCT 7, 2016 How : bottle Appearance : dark red with a medium to small off-white head. Aroma : dark berries, plums, grass, spice,bread and citrus peel. Palate : medium body, average carbonation.
[backlog] 23-04-16 // bottle at Krokodil Mainz. Pours a drak brown cloudy beer, beige foamy head. Malty yeasty body. Some roast malts, some nuts, ripe banana.

Color marrón caramelo, medianamente turbio, con capa de espuma de un blanco algo sucio de dos dedos de grosor (buena retención). Carbonatación media pero insuficiente en boca (textura acuosa, le iría mejor algo más de efervescencia en boca). Aroma a trigo, malta tostada, levadura. Más complejo y apetecible que el de la Hefeweizen. Sabor a trigo, también malta tostada, fresco, sencillo y con mucho carácter. Un acierto.

Dark amber, bit reddish with medium to small off white head. Slightly sour aroma with sweet notes. Quite strong soureness and nmalty sweetnes, some roasted caramel notes, all follwed by medium biternes with coriander notes. These nptes are also in the aftertaste.

Have been keeping a 1/4 keg of this dunkelweizen in my beer cooler for seven years and have not found anything better for general consumption. It has become hard to find in the U.S. in bottles so if you see it, buy it. Fortunately, my local beer distributor has procured it on a regular basis. Dark, cloudy pour with caramel, roasty malt, ripe banana, nuts and an earthy finish. The best thing about it is the low ABV.

0,5 l bottle, served in weizen glass. Poured cloudy mahogany brown with a two finger light tannish head. Lively carbonation in glass. Aroma: overripe banana, cloves, caramel, vanilla. Taste: Brown sugar, overripe banana, toffee, bread, spices, vanilla, nuts. Sweet malty mouthfeel. Almost no bitterness at all. Medium body with a fruity, spicy finish. Good dunkelweizen.

Aroma: caramel, bread.
Appearance: brown color, dense fine head.
Taste: caramel and white bread
Bottle. Dark brown and hazy. light sweetness, medium sourness. Not bad, but no special.
Całkiem dobre. Jasnobrunatne, mętne. Gęsta, długo pozostająca piana. Minimalna wędzonka, goryczkowość.

Jasnobrązowe, mętne piwo o średniej pianie, która pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat intensywny bananowy. W smaku bananowe, lekko kwaskowe. Goryczka niska, Ogólnie udany ciemny weizen, bardzo pijalny i orzeźwiający.

Bue 1 mois avant DLC aux Canaries. Biere ambree foncee/brune pale a fin col de mousse a tenue moyenne. Forte carbonation a fines bulles. Arome de malt grille, metal pas tres agreable (trop vieille/mal conservee?) mais aussi dabricot. En bouche, malt caramelise, houblons. Final sur sur fruits jaunes, peches en particulier.
Bruine kleur. Ruikt gistig. Vrij dun mondgevoel, smaak impressie van banaan, steenvruchten.

50 cl bottle bought at Alcampo, Madrid. Pours hazy cloudy very dark reddish mahogany, huge short-lasting tan head. Mild to medium aromas of caramel, rye bread, plums, prunes, honey and cranberries. Refreshing, fizzy, watery, easy to drink. Almost no bitterness in the low-lingering finish. All in all, nice.
Spouts cloudy dark brown with an off white head. Aroma is toasted malt with yeastiness. Flavor is toasted malt with fruity flavors and slight bananna and yeasty finish.

Castanho intenso opaco quase caramelo com espuma de boa formação e longa duração ligeiramente bege.

Encorpada como malte bem presente, leve torrado no sabor e no aroma. Dulçor característico que se torna bem presente no aroma e menor no sabor tornando-a um breja de alto drinkability.

Garrafa 500ml - Rio de Janeiro, Brasil - 31/7/2016 (nova degustação)

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Aromat: z butelki wędzony, lekko szynkowy banan, dalej trochę paloności i piwnica, ciekawie
Wygląd: barwa brunatna, muliste, beżowa drobnobańkowa piana, opada do cienkiej warstwy na powierzchni,
Smak: wyraźny banan na pierwszym planie, lekko wodniste, dalej mamy trochę paloności, ale dość subtelnej, finisz zdecydowanie drożdżowy, goryczka niska, ledwie wyczuwalna
Podniebienie: średnie nagazowanie, brak pełni, średnie pijalność
Podsumowanie: myślałem, że będzie lepiej, intrygujący aromat i w sumie tyle
Cerveja muito saborosa com cor castanha, carbonatação boa, corpo equilibrado, garrafa 0,5l
Dunkel  minha favorita não precisa estar estupidamente gelada sabor cor cheiro perfeita  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

Splendido colore ambrato scuro ma scarsissima schiuma che se ne va subito. Buon molto al palato, ma anche questo senza troppa persistenza. Dissetante, di basso grado alcolico, ma alla fine resta poco da ricordare
Light brown color. Aromas of rich bananas, cookies, and fresh baked dark bread. Sweetish, bready, banana, rich taste with some cutting acidity through the middle. Very good.
Boa Dunkel. Seguindo o padrão alemão é bem equilibrada. Mais para refrescante do que para saborosa
Raikas, hienosti vaahtoava kuparinen olut. Raikas ja maltainen. Hyvä kesäolut, jos kaipaa tummemman.
Murky brown pour with a decent off white head. Dried fruit, caramel, bready aromas. Taste is caramel, banana, a little spice, almost a cream soda flavour too. Little bit too sweet.

500ml bottle. Cloudy pastel brown in colour with a fine, pale yellow head. Aroma of haylage with smoked cinder toffee. The flavour is smooth, akin to that of banana, with a little cream and slight floral notes. Most enjoyable.

Poured from bottle at Brathaus dark opaque mahogany with minimal creamy head. Aroma earthy carmel. Palate fizzy with spicy enjoyable carbonation feel. Taste faintly sweet with no bitterness and long finish. One of my favorite German beers, favorite Weißbiers, favorite dark beers and all at just 5% ABV. Highly recommended.

Bottiglia. Al naso arrivano percezioni di frumento e banana. Lintensità olfattiva è elevata e la persistenza olfattiva è apprezzabile. Il cappello di schiuma ha una scarsa tenuta, a bollicine medie e carbonazione bassa. Laspetto del liquido è velato. Le bollicine sono poche e medie. La carbonazione è morbida e persistente. Il colore è ambrato carico tendente rossiccio. Il corpo è pieno. Il dolce è medio e lamaro è medio, non si surclassano. Lintensità gustativa è elevata e la persistenza gustativa è buona. Il gusto è piacevole. Le sensazioni boccali finali sono di pronta beva. Il finale è lungo e dissetante. Il retrogusto è intenso. Il tetto della bocca riporta sentori di frumento, fiori, erba, vaniglia e banana.
Bottle 0.5 l Een van de betere bieren in dit segment. Mooie donkere kleur, licht zoet van smaak, crème kleurige schuimkraag. Doordrinkertje. Ook het allerlaatste beetje donkerbruine gist uitschenken.
Ótima dunkel weiss, coloração indo do rubi para o marrom. Puxado para banana tanto no aroma quanto no sabor.

Yeast, hints of banana, brown/reddish with a huge white/tan head quite persistant, light/medium body, medium carbonation, too sweet for me, banana and grains...i prefer the classic weisse too sweet but good job monk.

Three labels on the bottle with detail information about how do I pour this beer into a glass. No information about the malts, hops or drinktemperature.
A cloudy brown beer with a nice cream-colored head, I can taste banana, finish is very short and not dominated, no malty, vanilla, good balanced between sweet and bitter, average carbonation, medium body, 
(I have a 0.5l bottle with batch L079616 21:04 and best-before 03.2017)

Bottle. Hazy brown colour with a big, white head. Aroma of yeast, wheat, malt and light bananas. Taste of yeast, malt, light bananas. Medium carbonation with a medium body. I prefer the Weissbier Naturtrub.
Hazy brown with a green touch and little white head. Aroma: herbal note with banana. Taste is weaker. Sourness with nothing much else. Not so drinkable... overall average.

UPDATED: MAY 8, 2016 0.5L bottle. Cloudy dark brown colour with a two-three finger thick creamy off-white head. Aroma of malt, wheat, yeast, banana, clove. Taste of light roasted malt, wheat, yeast, banana, dark/berry fruits, spices/cloves, some sweetness. Good carbonation, medium body, smooth, light creamy-watery mouthfeel. Very good.

50cl bottle courtesy of a friend. 
Thick creamy white head. Cloudy amber pour. Refreshing.
Coloração escurecida vinda dos maltes tostados. Excelente formação e estabilidade de espuma. Notas de chocolate e caramelo com suave refrescancia.
Couleur marron reflet rouge, peu de mousse, nez léger. Goût de banane caramélisé très agréable un peu fade sur la fin

I had bottled, imported version, purchased in Alma Poland for 1.5 eur. Very tasty. Before this one I had Franziskaner Witzen Kristallklar and Dunkel is much better. Foam not too strong. Rusty colour. In taste Hefe, caramel and suprisingly nice sour. Will come back for sure

APARIENCIA: color marrón, turbia, sin embargo se observa moderada actividad de carbonatación; corona de espuma color marfil de baja retención, de burbujas compactas.

AROMA: notas de pan, plátano, clavo, pimienta, maltas tostadas, lúpulo imperceptible.

SABOR: notas de pan, plátano, clavo, pimientas, maltas tostadas muy efímeras. Retrogusto amargor muy ligero, seco y astringente. 

SENSACIÓN: cuerpo ligero, carbonatación moderada alta.

RESUMEN: Una dunkelweizen sin mucho carácter, muy ligera y con poco sabor.
Cerveja de trigo dunkel encorpada é muito equilibrada. Excelente custo beneficio. Como toda franciscana, uma cerveja sem erro
Ótima cerveja. Muito sabor e bom corpo. Bom aroma tb. Otimo paladar. Para mim, uma das melhores weiss. Nesse caso dunkel.
Rich,dark, choco;ate aroma with a smooth finish. possibly one of Germanys most velvety beers ever produced. Deep rich wheaty overtones and lasting finish! Great!
On the tap in Dallas. Cloudy brown with a creamy off white foam. Good body, moderate sweetness and a light fruit finish.
Bottle, pours cloudy brown with high white head. Aroma of banana, bread, yeast, caramel, dar malt and some ester notes. In taste light sweetness with some sour aftertaste. Very nice Weizen.
Color of dark rust. Mild edgy bittee taste with a home made cherry sweet jam taste.
Bottle at home. Medium sized tanned head, dark brown liquid. Carbonation is quite soft. Aroma has banana, yeast and maltiness. Medium sweetness, light to medium bitterness.
On tap red brown with a cream colored head. Aroma of dark grains and banana. Taste follows nose.

Pours rust colored from the bottle with a big creamy head. Excellent lacing. The aroma imparts a fair measure of banana, bread baked with brown sugar, and a hint of clove. Taste is bitter, verging towards metallic, and the bitterness can be a bit deadening. Still, the beer works surprisingly well with food, especially spicy food, which draws out some of the banana sweetness. Works well with salsa. The palate is unfortunately watery in places. The finish is long and lightly sweet. 
Drank many of these over the years, and this is a decent beer, but there are better alternatives out there.
Vom Fass. Braunes trübes Bier mit flachem Schaum. Es riecht nach Brotteig mit einem Hauch Rosine. Geschmack Getreide, Brit und Hefe. Recht langweilig.

50cl bottle. Murky brown pour with a tall tan head with excellent retention, as is expected from a weizen. Smells like yeast, bread dough, bananas, coriander. Tastes bitter-sweet, with the same notes as the smell.
50 cl bottle from Vinmonopolet. Pours clear amber with a big off-white head. Aromas of malts, fruits and yeast. Taste is bittersweet. Good dunkelweizen.

500 ml bottle directly from Deutschland (Danke, Christine), served cool in a tulip glass. 05.2016.
App.: Very deep copper/mahogany with a proud orange-light tan head.
 
Aroma: Quite metallic, fairly strong banana esters, rich, sweet maltiness, bread crust, cookies, a little dark dried fruit.
 
Palate: Medium body, fairly full and somewhat lively carbonation.
 
Flav.: Metallic, bananas, rich maltiness; fairly dry with low bitterness and a metallic/banana/malty finish.

Nice, except for the metallic defect.

UPDATED: MAR 1, 2016 L: Pours hazy brown, coffee-like color. Thick head 2.5 fingers tall.
S: Banana mostly.
T: Banana, roasted malts. Hops are hard to find.
F: Medium-bodied, crispy.
O: Common dark beer with hint of banana.
Butelka 500 ml o ciemnorubinowej barwie,piana szybko znikająca,sredniowysycone.W smaku słod,,jeczmien i lekko palone.Fajne.
Nice and clear rubin colour but even high carbonation cant save poor head. In taste caramel and a little banana. Medium bitter, full body, quite drinkable.

Janaury 29, 2016. Bottle, best before July 2016. Hazy amber with a large, quite fizzy, white head. Aroma is toffee, bread, notes of banana, cloves, slight nutty and roasted notes. Taste is light to medium sweet, soft bitter. Finish is light sweet malty with dark bread, hints of toffee, banana, light bitter and light spicy. Medium bodied, soft to average carbonation. 
Decent...
Aroma discreto e aparência marrom com espuma densa. Sabor com amargor leve, mas deixando um bom paladar.

W zapachu wyra?ny banan spowielony karmelem, ciastkami i pumperniklem. Zm?tniony, ciemny rubin w kolorze. Piana rachityczna, jak na weizena poni?ej krytyki. W smaku du?a pe?nia wraz z bananami i go?dzikami. Bardzo "zapychaj?ce", lecz bardzo dobre.
Both aroma and taste are weaker than its Naturtrub type. Finish is thin. Lack of aftertastes.

An aroma that ressembles a champagne, with cloudy dark color and a taste of roasted malt at the end.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

UPDATED: MAY 13, 2016 0.5l bottle from weil, 0.90
pours a cloudy dark chestnut with a steady off-white head and a nice lacing. aroma of yeast, bread. flavour of yeast, rye bread, nuts, toasted malts.
Gewoon lekker thuis. Lekker caramel bananig graan bier. Backlog from 2015/06/30.
Ligesom søsteren, den lyse hvedeøl, så hører dunkel også til mine favoritter. Dunkel har en noget fyldigere smag med et strejf af chokolade.

Barwa ciemnego bursztynu, zmętnione, obfita piana, która jedna słabo zdobi szkło. W aromacie przede wszystkim goździki, trochę bananów. W smaku oprócz wyżej wymienionych i lekkiej kwaskowości, leciutka wędzonka.

Very smooth beer. No bitterness at all. After taste is nice and crisp and bit over powering. This is bottle conditioned and you will get a decent 2 finger foam with yeast still in it. You will have a little bit if sediment at the bottom of the glass but not much. A good beer for a glass or two. Price where I purchased it was about $2.75 a bottle. Not bad for a pretty good beer.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

Good example of German Dunkel beer (in bottle).
This example has not a big foam and pretty woтderfull coffee color.
Aroma is not very good expressed but at the same time very mild and pleasant.
A taste consists of 2 components : something a little bit caramel with bread and a little bit coffee.
A palate dissappears pretty fast but and covers all the taste in your mounth and throat with good example of beer magic (lol).

Marrom escura, alguns sedimentos suspensos, turva. Espuma bege de boa formação e média persistência. Aroma de cravo e banana característicos, mas um pouco menos adocicada que a versão clara, trás um leve torrado, que era de se esperar. Paladar de leve dulçor, nada de amargor. Corpo médio, baixa carbonatação. Aftertaste segue as impressões do paladar inicial, evidenciando mais o malte com o aumento da temperatura. Em geral uma weiss um pouco abaixo de outras alemãs.

Flasche 0,5l: Kastanienbraun mit deutlicher Trübung und mittelporigem Schaum; frische, recht fruchtige Nase mit malziger Süße, Hefearomen, dunklen Früchten und etwas Kaffee; im Körper recht mild und cremig mit einer angenehmen Süße, kräftiger Malzigkeit, leichter Würze, Röstaromen und etwas Kaffee

I didn't take any extra notes when I tried this beer for the first time but I'm gonna try it again and update my comments.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Draft. Opaque brown color with off-white head. Caramel malt aroma with clove notes. Caramel and bready malt with some chocolate notes. Some coriander and clove with subtle bitterness in the smooth finish. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Poured a nice, hazy brown/amber with about 2 fingers of light brown head.
On the nose, hints of yeast, wheat, sweetness. On first taste, the wheat, banana, a little bready note and some spice.
Medium body, nice carbonation. Light/dry finish with no real aftertaste.
Liked that one. One of the best dunkels Ive tried.
Very hazy brown body with dense bright yellow head. A lot of banana in aroma. Banana, yeast, carb, flour in sour taste. Easy drink. Not bad.
50cl bottle. dark brown colour, quite hazy. rich beigehead but little lacing. aroma of yeast, roasted malts and wheat. roasted malts in taste, quite drinkable, average carbonation. good one

Great beer. Dark appearance does not mach its taste as its sweater than it looks. Light and easy to drink, very enjoyable.

50 cl at Continente, Lisbon.
Dark colour with big head.Roast, wheat, and spices .Caramel, clove and banana flavour.
Good yeasty aroma, clove, a little bit agressive though. A little bit sour taste, clove, high carbonation. Low bitterness. Nice.

I had this whilst skiing in Austria. Great head colour and flavour. More banana than clove aroma but both are lighter than I anticipated. Nice body and mouth feel. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Aroma: roasted dark malts, cloves, banana.
Appearance: heavily hazy amber color and thin white head.
Taste: cloves, roasted dark malts, zesty, something like turpentine, iron.
Palate: medium body and high carbonation.
Overall: Very poor stuff, disappointing.
Bottiglia da 0,50. Schiuma densa e persistente. Colore castagno non intenso. Carbonatura leggermente eccessiva. Aroma di caffè e nocciola. Gusto appena amaro. Finale secco ma lungo. Consiglio 7/10

Bottle 50cl. @local AH supermarket. Murky deep amber to amber brown, large frothy off-white head, good retention, somewhat shy aroma, wheat, caramel, banana, bit citrus, yeast; mild taste medium sweet, wheaty, caramel, light sour undertones; light to medium body, watery texture, soft carbonation, sourishness more prominent in aftertaste, maly and fruity accents; rather mild example of the style, nice.
Botella 50 cl de el c. Ingles Oviedo. Tomada en mayo 2002 (r1749). Lote 07823j hasta 03..2003. sin muchas sorpresas y sin duda la mejor de las tomadas de la marca.
UPDATED: OCT 17, 2015 Esta cerveza se bebe genial, de mis favoritas en birras oscuras de trigo. Relación calidad-precio de lo mejor del mercado.

Excessive foam. Elegant taste of roasted malt with good caramel notes on a slightly fruity background where little banana stand out. It is an utterly type really obscure hefe where sweetness levels are a little higher than expected.

Bottle courtesy of David. Pours a slightly cloudy mid brown colour with a big creamy off white head. Aroma of sweet malts, bread, light roasting and bit nutty. Quite high sweetness, light bitterness. Medium body, average carbonation.
Bottle 50cl. Brown with almost no head. Typical wheat aroma with banana and other fruit. Soft easy to drink beer. High carbonized, though. Short finish.

This is a weak beer, but not bad. Very inoffensive, but not something to choose 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Pours up a cloudy red mahogany, with a nice tan head. Aroma is cloves with cereals and bananas. The taste is slightly sweet with notes of caramel and figs, with light wheat bite. The finish is slightly spicy. Good stuff.
Excelente, forte aroma de banana e pão, sabor encorpado sem ser muito carregado. Tomei uma, já encomendei outras!

This was poured into a weizen glass.
The appearance was a hazy dark bronzed close to brown color with a one to two finger white foamy head that quickly dissipated. Light lacing is stringy running here and there down into the beer.
The smell starts off with a nice sweet banana running into light spicy clove and as it warms a nice little bit of cocoa combines to balance.
The taste pretty much exemplifies the aroma with the cocoa showing even lighter qualities in the aftertaste and finish.
On the palate, this one sat about a light on the body with a big sessionability about it. Carbonation is somewhat there.
Overall, Id say this was a nice dunkelweizen but for some odd reason, I think I was expecting a bit more body on it. Id still have it again.
Bottle from dans, holland park, banana aromas, thin lasting white head with good lacing, this is my lovely wifes favourite beer

amber body with a big pale beige head. Aroma has caramel, some lighter banana/bubblegum yeast and hint of clove. Flavor is wheat, malt, caramel, brown sugar, banana, yeast and whatever expected from a classic German dunkeweizen.

Aroma: Medium munich, medium-light banana, light clove
Appearance: Hazy, dark copper body. Medium, tan head. Fair retention.
Flavour: Medium bready, medium-light munich. Medium-light banana, clove. Dry finish, lingering clove and banana, light bready.
Mouthfeel: Medium body, Medium-high, creamy carbonation.
Overall: Well balanced, a great example.

500 ml bottle, roused, poured.
500ml bottle. Copper brown color with off white head. Yeasty and malty aroma, light fruity, bread, grainy, caramel. Sweet and bitter taste. Medium oily body with soft carbonation.

På kran på Prego, Danmarksplass, Bergen. Mørk tåkete nøttebrun kropp med et fint høyt brunt skum. Treaktige gjærtoner dominerer aromaen. Litt toffeesødme og friskhet. Medium kropp. Litt melete tekstur.

Mild weissebier aroma. Grainy, toast, malts, and in general a creamy brew. Lacking the spices of some other dunkel weisse biers. Abrupt finish of semi sweet malt. I used to think this was the best dunkel weisse, but now
 I find it rather light and bland. A dissappointment.

-Typical Hefeweizen with Banana,clove,quite a strong wheat flavour.
-there was absolutely nomalt character here
-undercarbonated
-finish was too light

The fact that malt was nonexistent in this leads me to believe they used artificial darkener in this.Certainly wont put it behind ABInBev.
Tasted like a normal Franziskaner Hefe except with less carbonation and lighter-bodied
The Erdinger Dunkel wasnt great either but at least it tasted like a Dunkel

Colore tonaca di frate con schiuma fine abbondante e persistente di color avorio. Al naso note fruttate (banana e frutta gialla matura) si accompagnano a note tostate (nocciola) e leggermente affumicate. Entra troppo carbonata, con corpo esile. Al palato è di nuovo fruttata e leggermente acidula e tostata. Amaro quasi nullo. Molto beverina comunque
Comparada con la Naturtrub no aporta nada. Por lo demás es una trigo dunkel aceptable.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

0,5 bottle. Pours muddy brown color with medium, quickly diminishing white head. Poor head lacing. Aroma of clove, bananas, yeast, wheat. Flavor is light sweat, very light bitter, with spicy notes. Finish is medium long. Medium body, average carbonation, hazy liquid. Drinkable.
0,5l bottle. Brown color with creamy white head. Aroma is banana, spices, toasted malt and cloves. Taste is sweet and spicy. Ovreall its great Dunkelweizen.
Brown color with tan head. Aroma is spicy bananas, some dark malts. Taste is more bananas, some vanilla, a bit spicy, dark bready malts. Quite a sharp spicy finish. A delicious Dunkelweizen.

Cervesa amb bona cremositat i en sabor destaquen els tocs a caramel.
Cerveza con buena cremosidad y en sabor destacan los toques a caramelo.

On tap in Munich 
Cloudy brown with a medium sized beige head, some lacing. Aroma of vanilla and toasted malts. Taste of caramel, vanilla and white chocolate  
Nice, smooth

(bottle 500ml)
Aroma: mainly bread aroma with some banana notes in the back.
Appearance: hazy, dark copper color, big quickly disappearing beige head.
Taste: strong bread flavour, hint of banana, medium to heavy sweetness, light sourness lasting till finish. Bready/grainy aftertaste.
Palate: medium carbonation, medium body, creamy.
Overall: Malt-oriented beer , its dominated by bready notes, banana and clove hints is barely noticeable..

Pours nice hazy brown with creamy persistent beige head. Aroma of yeasty, bit of cloves. Taste is light sweet and sour, a bit metallic aswell, with some roasted malts at the end. Lively carbonation, medium body.
Pours murky brown with white lacing head. Notes banana, roasted, malts, wheat. Quit nicely balanced and easy drinkable.- beerbasher
Watching The Hobbit 3. In Paulaner glass. Even being a good one, I prefer the blonde version. This one is a bit more sweet than I like.
Pours a dark hazy brown. Aromas of, bread, nuts, dough and banana. Taste the same with malt. Not overwhelming flavor. But not bad.

Aroma of dark malt, wheat, banana, roasted nuts and dark fruit. Pours cloudy dark brown liquid with a big white soapy head. Sweet taste, flavour is mostly banana, pear along with other fruits, sugar, roasted malt and wheat. Light body with a slick texture and lively carbonation, fruity finish and a little watery. Nice fruity taste, but too thin.

Spanje, 2015, schenkt donker caramelbruin met lichte kraag. aroma van caramel, toffee, graan, citrus. smaken zacht bitter, redelijk zoet, brood, zoete mout, banaan, licht zuur, matige body, glad, nope !!
Hazy brown of color with a beige head. An aroma of wheat, bread, yeast and caramel. A flavor of wheat, caramel, sweets and bread.
Brown, cloudy pour. Aroma suggests faint traces of wheat, yeast and bananas. Taste reveals the same. Decent and pleasant to drink, but a little thin in taste. Overall drinkable.
Aroma of wheat, some malt, banana, toffee, yeasty notes. Flavour is moderate sweet with a slight bittersweet finish. A bit thin and watery. Smooth and pleasant if unremarkable Dunkelweizen.
bread, citrus, dough, cooked vegetables, brown, hazy, minimal head, light sweetness, medium bitterness, medium sourness, light body, soft carbonation, drinkable but has a weak aroma and taste.

ASPETTO: marrone molto torbido, con schiuma bianca, fine e persistente. AROMA: tipico di una weiss, con sentori citrici e fruttati. GUSTO: si assomiglia alla sua sorella maggiore, la bionda. Diciamo che ha meno banana di questultima, ma chiude con un gradevole e chiarissimo sentore di frutti di bosco. Corpo leggero, carbonizzazione abbastanza accentuata. CONCLUSIONE: preferisco la bionda, che è sicuramente più pulita e dissetante, ma anche questa si difende bene.
500ml bottle in Tenerife. Pours cloudy and dark brown with a nice off white head. Sweet, malty aroma. Taste is malt, chocolate and banana. Good

Bottle 0,5.
Pours copper color, hazy. Aroma: yeasty, fruity. Taste: a little sour, sweet aftertaste. Enjoyable.
Bottle. Cloudy brown color with good foam. Aroma: wheat malt, yeast, caramel and kvass. Taste: mixture of wheat and caramel, sweets and ligth sour, some roasted malt.

On tap at Bavarian Bier Cafe, Gold Coast. Pours dark copper with a creamy head and hint of smokiness in the aroma. Strong malty taste with very little bitterness. It was interesting to try this side-by-side with both a dunkel and traditional German hefe.

BOTTLE 50 CL. Cloudy mahogany, big creamy beige head. Strong cloves in the nose,, followed by some fermented cereals and sweet dried bananas. The taste is also on the sweet side with notes of caramel and sweet dried figs, with light wheat tartness. The finish is somewhat thin and slightly spicy. Not bad. Probably sweeter than I want and lacks some body too.
An unclear very dark brown beer with a good head and an aroma of yeast. It has a slightly acidic taste.
Ruby-amber with a fluffy white head and a malty, ripe fruit aroma. Easy intro with a mild, soft palate and a somewhat bitter, raisiny, brown sugar finish.

The beer pours a beautiful thick layer of soft almond colored foam. Beautiful. Unfortunately, the foam disappears quickly, but a thin foam layer remains. The beer has beautiful reddish brown color. The smell is really good. I think I smell coriander, and many other spices. There are also zesty citrus aromas. The taste comprehends this aromas to. Herbal, spicy and fruity. Very nice.

Dark brown body with a medium beige head. Aroma is malty, caramel, yeast and some fruit. Taste is sweet with low bitterness. Medium to light body, watery texture, slight bitter aftertaste, long finish.
Brown with a medium beige head. Aroma is yeast, bananas, raisins, light chocolate. Taste is bananas, chocolate, caramel. Sweet aftertaste.
500ml bottle. Hazy brown body with a tall white head. Dark malts, caramel, banana and some spices. Quite ok.

Coloração marrom,líquido levemente espesso,creme bege alto apresentando boa duração,boa carbonação,aroma maltado,com notas frutadas sem ser enjoativo,sabor igualmente maltado,com leve toque condimentar do cravo;banana,trigo,caramelo,lúpulo complementam o sabor;final doce,bem refrescante,boa drinkability;uma cerveja leve e deliciosa,recomendo.

0.5 l bottle @ Restaurant Loiste, Helsinki. Dark, almost black colour. Despite the dark colour taste is similar to the light coloured hefeweizens. Well, it is a bit more malty. Quite easy to drink and great even on a hot summer day.

Propiedades típicas del estilo en cuanto a color y espuma (muy abundante, cuatro dedos.) Muy burbujeante y turbia. Color marrón.Aroma frutal. En boca no pierde los componentes frutales característicos (plátano) que salen al final, pero antes gustos mas dulzones: malta tostada, canela... Notable en conjunto,.

UPDATED: FEB 28, 2016 
Aroma:

Malts, bread, yeast, banana and dark fruit.

Appearance:

Turbid ruby/brown beer with a slight/medium off-white head.

Taste/Palate:

Medium sweet with malts, bread, yeast, banana and dark fruit.

Kolor brunatny, lekko zmetnione. Piana pozostawia ladna warstewke. W aromacie banany, ciastka, chleb, karmel, troszke gozdzika. W odczuciu gladkie, polwytrawne, srednio wysycone. W smaku dominuje gozdzik, banana troche mniej, ale tez jest wyczuwalny, troche drozdzy i brazowych akcentow slodowych, a to wszystko kontrowane wyraznym, palono-cytrynowym kwaskiem, na finiszu delikatna, ziolowa goryczka.
Mijn favoriete bananenbier maar dan met een moutsmaak er doorheen. Anders dan wat ik gewend ben van witbier, maar wel lekker.
Good wheat beer, cloud appearance, as expect for this kind of beer, rich malt aroma, medium bitterness,

Franziskaner Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel has a thick, cream-colored head, a murky, red-brown-gold appearance, fierce bubble streams. Lacing isnt much, with this one. Aroma is of wildflowers, yeast, and bread, and the taste is of sweet, spicy bread, tap water, and a touch of sourness. Mouthfeel is medium and fluffy, and Franziskaner Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel finishes on the dry side and drinkable. RJT
Non è tra le migliori dunkel che ho bevuto, ma è comunque una versione riuscita bene.

Spisane z Notatek kiedy Ratebeer był w zeszycie i główne poszukiwania nowych piw i smaków, odkrywanie świata to były głównie piwa zagraniczne w dużej mierze niemieckie, 
Piwo wypite pierwszy raz: marcu 2005 - później też pite kilka razy, 
Z notatek wynika że smakowało jak na tamten czas :)

Looks cloudy light Brown Nice foam not much aroma nog Nice flavor wheat beer difficult to make a comparison ATM little less body then the Reg. Hefe imo still drinks away nicely also good weizen dunkel one of the beter i taste so far
Nice bitter aroma strong yest notes and cranberry. Dark red with thick tan head. Taste is flat with strong copper metal taste. Low carbonation. Maybe I have an old bottle.
Botle 500 ml. Aroma of roasted malts, wheat, caramel, yeasts. Dunkelweizen - not my type, but a decent beer.

Hmm, an apple bacon pancake beer! Typical dunkel beer so never great but also never bad.

50cl bottle from the supermarket

500 ml bottle. Quite clear (or unclear  depending of what you do with the bottle) amber body with a big pale beige head. Aroma has caramel, some lighter banana/bubblegum yeast and hint of clove. Flavor is wheat, malt, caramel, brown sugar, banana, yeast and whatever expected from a classic German dunkeweizen. And pretty classic this is, not the worst and not the best sample. Enjoyable.

Aroma: Fruity sweet with banana and some yeast. 
Flavour: Fruity sweet, banana and berries. 
Colour: Cloudy brown with an offwhite head.
50 cl Flasche. Schokobraunes, trübes Bier, cremefarbener, feinporiger, kurzlebiger Schaum. Bananiges Aroma, fruchtiger, leicht säuerlicher, leicht süßer Karamellgeschmack.

Bottle
Aroma-caramel, banana
Appearance-brown, hazy, white foam, 
Taste-lightly sour, light sweetness,
